event.title: SQL-Bristol Social Lunch
event.description:
An informal and social lunch time meet in central Bristol.  This is an opportunity to network with peers as well as chat about all things data, bring your challenges and questions along and hopefully get some good advice and support.

It is also a chance to share and learn about the interesting projects everyone is working on, who is using what technologies and what lessons they have learnt.

The lunch time social feeds into the formal events and presentations we are organising, let us know what topics you would like to see and any suggestions or feedback you might have.  Get involved in the community.
